name: Strike VR
description:
A shooter arcade game.. except you survive by moving your head to dodge bullets, enemies, and obstacles. You have two weapons: one on each arm. Can you beat the last boss?

Features
- 3 different unique stages with 5 levels each
- Total of 16 levels
- Endless Mode
- 11 unique bosses
- Weapons: Guns & Swords
- 3 different types of abilities
- 5 different types of ultimates
- Over 15 types of unique enemies

Developed by one person.. (:
